# spotted_playlist_image (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "spotted_playlist_image" "example_playlist_image" {
  playlist_id = "3cEYpjA9oz9GiPac4AsH4n"
  body = ""
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `body` (String) Base64 encoded JPEG image data, maximum payload size is 256 KB.
- `playlist_id` (String) The [Spotify ID](/documentation/web-api/concepts/spotify-uris-ids) of the playlist.
